resources.string: This app will generate a QR code which you can use to receive payment from your customers.
Sadly, the QR code is only a standard, so banks need to decide to implement it in their apps. All tested banks will have a logo under the QR code.

You will need to provide your name and the IBAN of your bank account in the preferences of the app. This way a valid QR code can be generated by only entering a price, instead of having to enter your information over and over again.
When the main screen is visible, click on the three dots on the top right of the screen. Then click on the \'preferences\' item.
You will see three fields where you need to supply information about your bank account.

Now go back into the main screen, enter a price, and show the QR code to your customer. When this code is scanned with a QR code scanner in a supported banking app it will open the transfer screen with the information you supplied.
